title: Bug 2940: Export Zip - Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor
description: When updating the checked state of the table in the Export Zip feature, it takes a long time (approximately 30 seconds in my case) to complete. The expected behavior is that a busy cursor should be shown during this process.
OB: Currently, there is no visual indication that the system is processing the update of the checkboxes in the Export Zip feature.
EB: The expected behavior is to display a busy cursor while the system is updating the checkboxes in the Export Zip feature.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the Export Zip feature.
2. Perform an action that triggers the update of the checkboxes.
3. Observe that there is no busy cursor displayed during the update process.
